title: The Githyanki Warrior
content:
s being held prisoner inside the artefact. We should talk to Lae'zel about him.

Find Voss at Sharess' Caress.

Lae'zel is eager to speak to Kith'rak Voss at Sharess' Caress. He knows someone who can help free Orpheus from his prison.

The Githyanki Warrior Walkthrough

You can save Lae'zel from some Tieflings at Ravaged Beach. (If she's not killed in the prologue) At Druid Grove, there's a tiefling has spotted the Githyanki patrol. (Let Lae'zel integrate him will gain some of her approval) Trav
